text: // chap5c.cpp // kbyrongbmecc.cuny.edu // 9-15-2022 revised 2-10-2025 // create and display an ordered linked list of integers #include <iostream> using namespace std; struct nodeType{ int info; nodeType *link; Y ittt nodeType* buildListFwdOrdered() ; // function prototype void insertNum(nodeType* &head,int num); // function prototype void showList(nodeType *head); // function prototype ] int main() { nodeType *head=buildListFwdOrdered(); showList (head) ; }
